{"step_by_step_thinking": "Tocilizumab is a medication that is used to treat certain autoimmune conditions, such as rheumatoid arthritis. It belongs to a class of drugs called biologic disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs (bDMARDs), which are different from conventional synthetic disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs (csDMARDs). Therefore, tocilizumab is not a csDMARD.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
